Today in County Sligo, surf is on with 7 ft @ 13s WNW swell and fresh 15 mph S winds. Strandhill and Easkey spots are working well, especially during their optimal tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 7 ft @ 11s WNW swell and lighter 8 mph S winds, making for a cleaner surf day. The day after, expect 4 ft @ 10s NW swell with moderate 12 mph W winds, still offering some fun rides. Best: tomorrow.
